verses.verse: ([A Psalm] of David.) Bless <WH1288> the Lord, <WH3068> O my soul; <WH5315> And all <WH3605> that is within <WH7130> me, [bless] His holy <WH6944> name. <WH8034>
Bless <WH1288> the Lord, <WH3068> O my soul, <WH5315> And forget <WH7911> none <WH408> <WH3605> of His benefits; <WH1576>
Who pardons <WH5545> all <WH3605> your iniquities; <WH5771> Who heals <WH7495> all <WH3605> your diseases; <WH8463>
Who redeems <WH1350> your life <WH9132> from the pit; <WH7845> Who crowns <WH5849> you with lovingkindness <WH2617> and compassion; <WH7356>
Who satisfies <WH7646> your years <WH5716> with good <WH9185> things, <WH9185> [So that] your youth <WH5271> is renewed <WH2318> like the eagle. <WH5404>
The Lord <WH3068> performs <WH6213> righteous <WH6666> deeds, <WH6666> And judgments <WH4941> for all <WH3605> who are oppressed. <WH6231>
He made <WH3045> known <WH3045> His ways <WH1870> to Moses, <WH4872> His acts <WH5949> to the sons <WH1121> of Israel. <WH3478>
The Lord <WH3068> is compassionate <WH7349> and gracious, <WH2587> Slow <WH750> to anger <WH639> and abounding <WH7227> in lovingkindness. <WH2617>
He will not always <WH5331> strive <WH7378> [with us]; Nor <WH3808> will He keep <WH5201> [His anger] forever. <WH5769>
He has not dealt <WH6213> with us according to our sins, <WH2399> Nor <WH3808> rewarded <WH1580> us according to our iniquities. <WH5771>
For as high <WH1361> as the heavens <WH8064> are above <WH5921> the earth, <WH776> So great <WH1396> is His lovingkindness <WH2617> toward <WH5921> those who fear <WH3372> Him.
As far <WH7368> as the east <WH4217> is from the west, <WH4628> So far <WH7368> has He removed <WH7368> our transgressions <WH6588> from us.
Just as a father has <WH1> compassion <WH7355> on [his] children, <WH7355> So the Lord <WH1121> has <WH3068> compassion <WH7355> on those who fear <WH7355> Him.
For He Himself <WH1931> knows <WH3045> our frame; <WH3336> He is mindful <WH2142> that we are [but] dust. <WH6083>
As for man, <WH582> his days <WH3117> are like grass; <WH2682> As a flower <WH6731> of the field, <WH7704> so <WH3651> he flourishes. <WH6692>
When <WH3588> the wind <WH7307> has passed <WH5674> over <WH5674> it, it is no <WH369> more; <WH369> And its place <WH4725> acknowledges <WH5234> it no <WH3808> longer. <WH5750>

But the lovingkindness <WH2617> of the Lord <WH3068> is from everlasting <WH5769> to everlasting <WH5769> on those who fear <WH3372> Him, And His righteousness <WH6666> to children <WH1121>'s children,
To those who keep <WH8104> His covenant, <WH1285> And who remember <WH2142> His precepts <WH6490> to do <WH6213> them.
The Lord <WH3068> has established <WH3559> His throne <WH3678> in the heavens; <WH8064> And His sovereignty <WH4438> rules <WH4910> over all. <WH3605>
Bless <WH1288> the Lord, <WH3068> you His angels, <WH4397> Mighty <WH1368> in strength, <WH3581> who perform <WH6213> His word, <WH1697> Obeying <WH8085> the voice <WH6963> of His word! <WH1697>
Bless <WH1288> the Lord, <WH3068> all <WH3605> you His hosts, <WH6635> You who serve <WH8334> Him, doing <WH6213> His will. <WH7522>
Bless <WH1288> the Lord, <WH3068> all <WH3605> you works <WH4639> of His, In all <WH3605> places <WH4725> of His dominion; <WH4475> Bless <WH1288> the Lord, <WH3068> O my soul! <WH5315>
